Nolaskinsentials Enzyme Mask, Pumpkin  (2020 formulation)

Brand: Nolaskinsentials

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Aqua, Cucurbita (Pumpkin Puree) Pepo, A, Barbadensis Mill, Citric Acid, Limnanthes Alba (MeadowFoam Seed), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower), Cinnamomum Zeylanicum, Glycolic Acid, Citrus Sinensis, Rosmarinus Officinalis, Citrus Limon, Melia Azadirachta (Neem), Pimenta Officinalis, Saccharum Officinarum, Ascorbic Acid, Vaccinium Myrtillus,

Cinnamomum Zeylanicum, Glycolic Acid, Citrus Sinensis, Rosmarinus Officinalis, Citrus Limon, Melia Azadirachta (Neem), Pimenta Officinalis, Saccharum Officinarum, Ascorbic Acid, Vaccinium Myrtillus, Myristica Fragrans, Vita-min E, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Cannabis Sativa Plant (Hemp Seed Oil), Cucumis Sativus, Leuconostoc Radish Root

Officinarum, Ascorbic Acid, Vaccinium Myrtillus, Myristica Fragrans, Vita-min E, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Cannabis Sativa Plant (Hemp Seed Oil), Cucumis Sativus, Leuconostoc Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate,
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
